description: Planter’s Punch is a cocktail that originated in Jamaica. But some people also believe that the drink originally originated at the Planter’s Hotel in South Carolina. And the first time that its recipe got issued in the&nbsp;London Magazine was in 1878. It is made with several juices, rum, sugar and grenadine syrup, and many more ingredients
name: Planter's Punch
